title: Getting started with the template editor
description: The template editor allows you to design your signatures, campaigns and disclaimers for both HTML and Plain text email. You can also preview your templates with user data for any selected user. This article tells you how to get started with the editor, how to use merge fields, and how to use conditional statements.
